title: Queen's Blade Bitoshi Gaiden
description:
Story 1 - Picture Scroll of the Musha-Miko
The story of the Musha-Miko Tomoe, and her fight against the Kouma Ninja Corps sent after her to prevent her from participating in Queen's Blade.

Story 2 - Tome of the Ancient Princess
The story of Queen's Blade participant Menace, how she died while being a princess of the Amara Kingdom and what happened after the Marshland Witch revived her.

Story 3 - Adventure of the Vangrant Warrior
The story of the heiress of the Earl Vance, Leina, and what happened when she decided to leave home and fight for the weak.
